name: A very minimal gmail theme
description: A minimalistic theme for Gmail with multiple elements paired down.  Gives an overall clean look to Gmail. Includes code for theming the Handle (Google Chrome) add-on.

user.name: stranaha
user.about: Turning the web dark one site at a time!

additional_info:
v1.3 -
a. Removed spam count and highlight
b. Fixed issue with background overlay when specifying a custom color
c. Slimmed down email composition window heading

v1.2 -
a. Overhauled Handle (Google Chrome add-on) code
     i.   Removed annoying orange accents
     ii.  Added code controlling accent colors to the top for easy tweaking
     iii. Removed several elements from Handle to make more minimal
b.  Improved compatibility with other backgrounds
c.  Fixed some transparency issues

v1.1 - 
a. Cleaned up code
b. Made even more minimal
c. Added translucency just about everywhere
d. Moved commonly customized elements to top of code for easy tweaking
e. Now supports multiple 'stock' Gmail theme backgrounds (but still works best with solid colors)
f.  Added background image for inbox zero :)
g. Known issue with inability to click the 'compose' button hopefully fixed
h. Added code to remove sponsored ads


v1.0 - Release!

discussions.name: the button of "Compose Mail" dont working
